page.title: 11Parish Council,Kexby.
page.content: Members of the Kexby Parish Council had a meeting in the Methodist Schoolroom on June 14th.I attended the meeting with my father as members of the public. A request from the village hall committee to extend the period of the village hall sports ground was discussed and it was agreed to negotiate a longer lease with the hall committee. The councillors then talked about the local Development Plan.They mainly talked about an open field on Church Road.They were all in favour of allowing this field to remain undeveloped.The need to cut the churchyard hedge was discussed and it was agreed to investigate the matter further.(the hedge they were discussing runs along the public footpath alongside the church)
